lead_paragraph: What began as a harrowing account of child abuse suffered by a former professional English soccer player last month has lifted the lid on what could be one of the worst pedophile scandals Britain has ever known.

headline.print_headline: Britain Shocked by Growing Soccer Child Abuse Scandal
headline.main: Britain Shocked by Growing Soccer Child Abuse Scandal

snippet: What began as a harrowing account of child abuse suffered by a former professional English soccer player last month has lifted the lid on what could be one of the worst pedophile scandals Britain has ever known....
